jpeg: Resolution and image content dependent Available JPG
exposuresetting: Manual shutter speed setting with direct dial, A-Mode with direct dial
sensitivityrange: ISO 160 – ISO 2500, Pull 80 available, Auto ISO
imagingplatform: DSP based computing platform with Leica imaging algorithms
flashsynchronization: Optional triggered at first or second shutter curtain
hotshoe: SCA-3502 compatible hot shoe, with center contact
material: All-metal case made of die-cast magnesium; synthetic leather covering. Cap and base plate made of brass
lensmount: Leica M bayonet with additional sensor for 6-bit coding
flashexposuremetering: Control with center-weighted TTL pre-flash metering (with SCA-3501/3502 adapter, or SCA-3000 standard flash unit such as Leica SF 24D/Leica SF 58).
cameratype: Compact digital view and rangefinder system still camera
shutter: Closed type focal plane shutter for classic image exposure, with external cocking mechanics
imagefileformat: DNG™ (RAW data uncompressed or nonlinear compressed), JPEG
exposuremetering: Through the Lens (TTL) metering, centerweighted with variable aperture Center-weighted TTL metering for flash exposure with system-conformant SCA- 3000/2 standard flash units
whitebalance: Auto / Daylight / Cloudy / Shade /Tungsten / Fluorescent 1 / Fluorescent 2 / Flash / Manual / Kelvin 2000-12800
topcover: Milled brass top cover with classic Leica M design
